nodes.description: 喀布尔Puli Mahmood Khan社区发生汽车炸弹袭击，造成至少93人受伤
nodes.support_text: Taliban detonated a powerful car bomb in an area of Kabul housing military and government buildings

nodes.description: 武装分子冲入目标建筑引发与阿富汗特种部队的枪战，战斗持续近7小时
nodes.support_text: gunmen storming a building and triggering a gun battle with special forces

nodes.description: 阿富汗卫生部确认1人死亡93人受伤，其中50名儿童伤势较重
nodes.support_text: health ministry said at least one person had been killed and 93 wounded

nodes.description: 五所学校部分受损，教育部呼吁保障师生安全
nodes.support_text: five schools had been partially damaged

nodes.description: 社交媒体流传医院内受伤儿童仍持课本的照片
nodes.support_text: social media images purportedly taken at a hospital showed wounded children

nodes.description: 塔利班宣称袭击针对国防部大楼并致人伤亡
nodes.support_text: Taliban claimed the attack targeted a defence ministry building

nodes.description: 阿富汗特种部队击毙至少2名袭击者并解救210名平民
nodes.support_text: Afghan forces and ambulances blocked off the area and rescued 210 civilians

nodes.description: Shamshad电视台办公室受损，7名记者受伤
nodes.support_text: Shamshad TV station... damage to its offices

nodes.description: 美国与塔利班在卡塔尔重启第三轮谈判
nodes.support_text: US eyes a breakthrough before Afghanistan's September presidential election

nodes.description: 塔利班拒绝与喀布尔政府谈判，要求先确定外国军撤时间表
nodes.support_text: Taliban refused to negotiate with Kabul administration

nodes.description: 美方强调所有协议需全部达成才生效
nodes.support_text: Washington will rush for the exits and allow the militants to return

nodes.description: 潜在撤军协议包含美国撤军及塔利班反恐承诺
nodes.support_text: a potential deal would see the US agree to withdraw its troops

nodes.description: 塔利班开始第七轮谈判
nodes.support_text: Taliban began the seventh round of talks

edges.support_text: The rush-hour blast... shook buildings nearly two kilometres away
health ministry said at least one person had been killed
five schools had been partially damaged
Taliban claimed the attack targeted a defence ministry building
Shamshad TV station... damage to its offices
gunfire continued... nearly seven hours after the first blast
some social media images purportedly taken at a hospital showed
the attack came just two days after... seventh round of talks
Washington eyes a breakthrough before Afghanistan's September presidential election
a potential deal would see the US agree to withdraw its troops
谈判重启后两日发生袭击事件
